name: Winged Realm
description:
That light on the far edge of the horizon hasn't vanished in a weeks! What's going on here? You'd fly over to investigate this instant, were it not for the fact that you'd get torn to shreds by horribly powerful monsters instantly, before you could even lose sight of the tower you've lived your whole life at the top of.

...so around the long way, under the miasma and through dangerous lands you must go.

________________________

Winged Realm is a *very* traditional RPG with NES stylings.

Features:

- Travel through two dungeons with the power of [limited] flight! Glide over small holes, and gain the ability to jump up to higher floors!

- Bolster your already-learned skills through ones found throughout the world by fighting certain foes! Each can only be learned by one person in your party, so choose carefully!

________________________

I started work on this way back in 2014, and while it's been abandoned for a long time, I felt it'd be nice to put it up somewhere slightly more public than a forum that lost its search feature.

Music that isn't by https://twitter.com/hhhhhhhazel is stolen from Kyuuyaku Megami Tensei.
